character.name: Cull
description: Can cast <c=keyword>powerful and dangerous spells</c>, but requires <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> to cast them.

HarvestAttack.name: HARVEST ATTACK
HarvestAttack.description: This attack will give you 1 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> if it does damage to shields.

CurrentSoul.description: <c=action>X</c> = The amount of <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> you currently have.

Wisp.name: WISP
Wisp.description: Shoots a <c=redd>1</c> damage shot once per turn, <c=downside>then turns into a Fading Wisp.</c> Cannot be destroyed.

DormantWisp.name: FADING WISP
DormantWisp.description: Shoots a <c=redd>1</c> damage shot once per turn, <c=downside>then destroys itself</c>. If attacked, will turn into a <c=keyword>Wisp</c>.

GreaterWisp.name: GREATER WISP
GreaterWisp.description: Shoots a <c=redd>2</c> damage shot once per turn. <c=downside>then turns into a Fading Greater Wisp.</c> Cannot be destroyed.

DormantGreaterWisp.name: FADING GREATER WISP
DormantGreaterWisp.description: Shoots a <c=redd>2</c> damage shot once per turn, <c=downside>then destroys itself</c>. If attacked, will turn into a <c=keyword>Greater Wisp</c>

SoulEnergy.name: Soul Energy
SoulEnergy.description: Necessary to use certain actions on certain cards <c=272727>Cull</c> has. <c=keyword>Limited to 10.</c>

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description: Take <c=keyword>+1 damage</c> when hit. <c=downside>Lost at the start of a turn.</c>

SoulDrain.name: Soul Drain
SoulDrain.description: At the end of your turn lose <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>, then reduce this by 1.

Empowered.name: Empowered
Empowered.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> when you hit the enemy, even if they have shields.

Cloaked.name: Cloaked
Cloaked.description: The enemy does nothing next turn. <c=downside>Lost immediately if you take any damage and at the start of your next turn.</c>

SoulSiphon.name: SOUL SIPHON
SoulSiphon.description: Every time your opponent's hull takes damage you gain 1 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>. <c=downside>Every time you take hull damage you lose 1</c> <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>. Upon reaching 10 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>, instantly give the enemy <c=status>FEAR</c>, and give it to them again every turn as long as you still have 10.

MercifulReaper.name: MERCIFUL REAPER
MercifulReaper.description: At the start of combat, add a <c=card>Harmless Siphon</c> to your hand.

ThreateningAura.name: THREATENING AURA
ThreateningAura.description: The enemy has <c=status>FEAR</c> at the start of combat.

EnhancedFocus.name: ENHANCED FOCUS
EnhancedFocus.description: The first time you take damage each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>.

OverclockedSiphon.name: OVERCLOCKED SIPHON
OverclockedSiphon.description: Every 3 times you hit the enemy, gain 1 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>.

CursedLantern.name: CURSED LANTERN
CursedLantern.description: You gain 1 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> every turn, <c=downside>BUT you lose 2</c> <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> <c=downside>when taking damage instead of 1.</c>

EnchantedScythe.name: ENCHANTED SCYTHE
EnchantedScythe.description: If you have at least 5 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c>, all attacks deal <c=keyword>+1 damage</c>.

Animism.name: ANIMISM
Animism.description: Gain 1 <c=status>SOUL ENERGY</c> when you destroy a midrow object.

CleoBooks.name: SUMMONING STAFF
CleoBooks.description: The first time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

CleoCat.name: NEVERMIND
CleoCat.description: During combat, when choosing a card to add to your deck, you may choose <c=card>None of the Above</c> instead.

CleoDizzy.name: FORTIFY
CleoDizzy.description: <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c> also increases the amount of <c=status>SHIELD</c> cards give. Each combat, choose a card in your deck to <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c>.

CleoIsaac.name: CARE PACKAGE
CleoIsaac.description: On the first turn of each combat, add either a <c=card>Supply</c> or a <c=card>Demand</c> to your draw pile.

CleoMax.name: TREND CHASER
CleoMax.description: Every 3 turns, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all copies of the most abundant card in your deck. Ties result in no discount.

CleoRiggs.name: PLAN B
CleoRiggs.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if a card in your hand is upgraded to B.

description.None: Attack for 1, inflicting <c=downside>Weak</c>. If you have 7 <c=status>Soul Energy</c>, inflict <c=downside>Brittle</c> instead.
description.A: Attack for 1, inflicting <c=downside>Weak</c>. If you have 7 <c=status>Soul Energy</c>, inflict <c=downside>Brittle</c> instead.
description.B: Attack for 1, inflicting <c=downside>Weak</c>. If you have 5 <c=status>Soul Energy</c>, inflict <c=downside>Brittle</c> instead.

description.None: Gain 1 <c=status>EMPOWERED</c>. Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=FFFFFF>Cull</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Gain 1 <c=status>EMPOWERED</c>. Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=FFFFFF>Cull</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Gain 1 <c=status>EMPOWERED</c>. Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=FFFFFF>Cull</c> cards to your hand.

character.name: Jay
description: Can manipulate your ship's parts individually by <c=keyword>changing them or moving them</c>. Can also preform actions based on what parts are where in your ship.

Reconfigure.name: RECONFIGURE
Reconfigure.description: Move all parts of your ship <c=keyword>left 1</c> (the leftmost goes to the right) <c=keyword>{0} time(s)</c>. Lasts until combat ends.

Rebuild.name: REBUILD {{partName}}
Rebuild.description: Change your leftmost part to a {{partName}} for the rest of combat. Keep any modifiers already on the part.

Detect.name: DETECT
Detect.description: Look at the leftmost part of your ship and preform an action <c=keyword>{0} time(s)</c> based on what part it is:

CellTower.name: CELL TOWER
CellTower.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 <c=status>SIGNAL BOOSTER</c>.

Blueprints.name: BLUEPRINTS
Blueprints.description: Gain 2 <c=part>Scaffolds</c> on both sides of your ship. When you <c=action>Detect</c> an empty part you also get <c=energy>1 ENERGY</c>.

BeltFeed.name: BELT FEED
BeltFeed.description: <c=energy>+1 ENERGY</c> every turn, <c=downside>but you</c> <c=action>Reconfigure 1</c> </c=downside>at the start of every turn.</c>

CleoBooks.name: SUMMONING STAFF
CleoBooks.description: The first time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

CleoCat.name: NEVERMIND
CleoCat.description: During combat, when choosing a card to add to your deck, you may choose <c=card>None of the Above</c> instead.

CleoDizzy.name: FORTIFY
CleoDizzy.description: <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c> also increases the amount of <c=status>SHIELD</c> cards give. Each combat, choose a card in your deck to <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c>.

CleoIsaac.name: CARE PACKAGE
CleoIsaac.description: On the first turn of each combat, add either a <c=card>Supply</c> or a <c=card>Demand</c> to your draw pile.

CleoMax.name: TREND CHASER
CleoMax.description: Every 3 turns, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all copies of the most abundant card in your deck. Ties result in no discount.

CleoRiggs.name: PLAN B
CleoRiggs.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if a card in your hand is upgraded to B.

SignalBooster.name: Signal Booster
SignalBooster.description: When you <c=action>Detect</c>, <c=action>Detect</c> the rightmost part as well, <c=downside>then lose 1.</c>

description.None: Move all parts of your ship <c=keyword>right 1</c> (the rightmost goes to the left).
description.A: Move all parts of your ship <c=keyword>right 1</c> (the rightmost goes to the left). <c=action>Detect 1.</c>
description.B: Move all parts of your ship <c=keyword>right 1</c> (the rightmost goes to the left).

description.None: The leftmost part of your ship becomes <c=status>Armored</c> for the rest of combat.
description.A: The leftmost part of your ship becomes <c=status>Armored</c> for the rest of combat.
description.B: The outermost parts of your ship become <c=status>Armored</c> for the rest of combat.

description.None: Shuffle all of your ship's parts, then <c=action>Detect 3</c>.
description.A: Shuffle all of your ship's parts, then <c=action>Detect 3</c>.
description.B: Shuffle all of your ship's parts, then <c=action>Detect 1</c>. Repeat 2 more times.

description.None: Reset your ships parts to how they were when combat started. <c=action>Detect 2.</c>
description.A: Reset your ships parts to how they were when combat started. <c=action>Detect 3.</c>
description.B: Reset your ships parts to how they were when combat started. <c=action>Detect 2.</c>

description.None: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack.
description.A: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +2 dmg after each attack
description.B: Pierce attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack

description.None: <c=action>Detect 3.</c> The leftmost part of your ship becomes <c=status>Weak</c> for the rest of combat.
description.A: <c=action>Detect 4.</c> The leftmost part of your ship becomes <c=status>Weak</c> for the rest of combat.
description.B: <c=action>Detect 5.</c> The leftmost part of your ship becomes <c=status>Brittle</c> for the rest of combat.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=001ab7>Jay</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=001ab7>Jay</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=001ab7>Jay</c> cards to your hand.

character.name: Luna
description: Uses a unique resource called <c=status>Stardust</c> to preform actions, but has to manage this resource across multiple battles. A lot of her cards are <c=keyword>dual-sided</c> so you can decide whether or not you want to spend <c=status>Stardust</c> for a more powerful effect.

MissingDust.description: <c=action>X</c> = The amount of <c=status>STARDUST</c> you are <c=keyword>currently missing.</c>

StardustCost.name: STARDUST COST
StardustCost.description: This action must spend <c=status>{0} STARDUST</c> to happen.

Stardust.name: Stardust
Stardust.description: A unique resource for <c=a661cb>Luna</c>, which is spent to play certain actions on her cards. <c=keyword>Limited to 10 by default.</c>

ResidualDust.name: Residual Dust
ResidualDust.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0} more</c> <c=status>STARDUST</c> at the end of combat.

LunarPendant.name: LUNAR PENDANT
LunarPendant.description: Start the run with <c=status>10 STARDUST</c>. <c=status>STARDUST</c> carries over between combat. Defeating a <c=keyword>Boss</c> gives you <c=status>10 STARDUST</c>.

StellarCharm.name: STELLAR CHARM
StellarCharm.description: Gain 1 more <c=status>STARDUST</c> from every battle you win.

LetterOfAcceptance.name: LETTER OF ACCEPTANCE
LetterOfAcceptance.description: The first time you play a <c=keyword>1 or 0 cost card</c> each turn (unless it exhausts), return it to the <c=keyword>bottom of the draw pile.</c>

ComponentPouch.name: COMPONENT POUCH
ComponentPouch.description: Your max <c=status>STARDUST</c> is increased by <c=keyword>5</c>. Gain <c=status>5 STARDUST</c> at the start of the next fight.

BackupCrystal.name: BACKUP CRYSTAL
BackupCrystal.description: The first time you run out of <c=status>STARDUST</c> this run, immediately gain <c=status>5 STARDUST</c>.

SolarPendant.name: SOLAR PENDANT
SolarPendant.description: <c=status>STUN CHARGE</c> is not spent if doesn't stun anything.

SpellShaper.name: SPELL SHAPER
SpellShaper.description: The first time you play a <c=keyword>Dual</c> card each turn, gain <c=energy>1 ENERGY</c>.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=a661cb>Luna</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=a661cb>Luna</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=a661cb>Luna</c> cards to your hand.

character.name: Centi
description: Capable of <c=keyword>temporarily upgrading and downgrading</c> cards in your hand and benefiting from them.

UpgradesInHand.description: <c=action>X</c> = The number of upgraded cards in your hand.

UpgradesInDiscard.description: <c=action>X</c> = The number of upgraded cards in your Discard pile.

UpgradesInExhaust.description: <c=action>X</c> = The number of upgraded cards in your Exhaust pile.

UpgradesInDraw.description: <c=action>X</c> = The number of upgraded cards in your Draw pile.

ImproveA.name: Improve A
ImproveA.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveB.name: Improve B
ImproveB.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

Impair.name: Impair
Impair.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveAHand.name: Improve Hand A
ImproveAHand.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveBHand.name: Improve Hand B
ImproveBHand.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImpairHand.name: Impair Hand
ImpairHand.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImproveA.name: Self Improve A
SelfImproveA.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> this card to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImproveB.name: Self Improve B
SelfImproveB.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> this card to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImpair.name: Self Impair
SelfImpair.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> this card to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

ImpairCost.name: Impair
ImpairCost.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version to pay for the corresponding action. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImprovedA.name: Improved A
ImprovedA.description: The next time this card is played it acts as an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play (if it does not <c=boldPurple>Exhaust</c>) and the end of the fight.

ImprovedB.name: Improved B
ImprovedB.description: The next time this card is played it acts as an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play (if it does not <c=boldPurple>Exhaust</c>) and the end of the fight.

Impaired.name: Impaired
Impaired.description: The next time this card is played it acts as a <c=boldPink>non-upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play and the end of the fight.

EnhancedTools.name: ENHANCED TOOLS
EnhancedTools.description: The first time you play an <c=cardtrait>improved</c> card each fight, <c=action>improve</c> another card with the same upgrade.

ReusableMaterials.name: REUSABLE MATERIALS
ReusableMaterials.description: After playing a card with <c=cardtrait>improved</c>, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

Kickstart.name: KICKSTART
Kickstart.description: At the start of each fight <c=action>Improve A</c> the first 2 eligible cards you draw.

MagnifiedLasers.name: MAGNIFIED LASERS
MagnifiedLasers.description: If your rightmost card is an <c=keyword>upgraded</c> card it has +1 to all <c=keyword>attacks</c> on it.

UpgradedTerminal.name: UPGRADED TERMINAL
UpgradedTerminal.description: If you have 3 <c=keyword>upgraded</c> cards in hand when you draw a card, <c=keyword>draw</c> an extra card, once per turn.

Retainer.name: RETAINER
Retainer.description: Cards no longer lose <c=cardtrait>Improved</c> when played.

ExpensiveEquipment.name: EXPENSIVE EQUIPMENT
ExpensiveEquipment.description: Non-upgraded cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Upgraded cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>discount</c>.

PowerEcho.name: POWER ECHO
PowerEcho.description: The first time you play an upgraded card each turn, create an <c=cardtrait>Impaired</c>, <c=cardtrait>single use</c>, <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=keyword>copy</c> of it in your hand.

CleoBooks.name: SUMMONING STAFF
CleoBooks.description: The first time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

CleoCat.name: NEVERMIND
CleoCat.description: During combat, when choosing a card to add to your deck, you may choose <c=card>None of the Above</c> instead.

CleoDizzy.name: FORTIFY
CleoDizzy.description: <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c> also increases the amount of <c=status>SHIELD</c> cards give. Each combat, choose a card in your deck to <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c>.

CleoIsaac.name: CARE PACKAGE
CleoIsaac.description: On the first turn of each combat, add either a <c=card>Supply</c> or a <c=card>Demand</c> to your draw pile.

CleoMax.name: TREND CHASER
CleoMax.description: Every 3 turns, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all copies of the most abundant card in your deck. Ties result in no discount.

CleoRiggs.name: PLAN B
CleoRiggs.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if a card in your hand is upgraded to B.

description.None: Draw an <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> card from your Draw pile.
description.A: Draw an <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> card from your Draw pile.
description.B: Draw three <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> cards from your Draw pile.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Small Repairs</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Small Repairs A</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.B: Add 2 <c=card>Small Repairs</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.

description.None: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Discard pile</c>.
description.B: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Exhaust pile</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=keyword>A upgrade</c>.
description.A: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=keyword>A upgrade</c>.
description.B: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the 2 rightmost eligible cards in your hand to their <c=keyword>B upgrades</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.A: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.B: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.

description.None: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack.
description.A: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +2 dmg after each attack
description.B: Pierce attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cull</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cull</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cull</c> cards to your hand.

description: Capable of <c=keyword>temporarily upgrading and downgrading</c> cards in your hand and benefiting from them.

ImproveA.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveB.name: Improve B

Impair.name: Impair
Impair.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveAHand.name: Improve Hand A
ImproveAHand.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveBHand.name: Improve Hand B
ImproveBHand.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImproveA.name: Self Improve A
SelfImproveA.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> this card to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImproveB.name: Self Improve B
SelfImproveB.description: <c=action>Upgrade</c> this card to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImpair.name: Self Impair
SelfImpair.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> this card to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

ImpairCost.description: <c=action>Downgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version to pay for the corresponding action. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImprovedA.description: The next time this card is played it acts as an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play (if it does not <c=boldPurple>Exhaust</c>) and the end of the fight.

ImprovedB.name: Improved B
ImprovedB.description: The next time this card is played it acts as an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play (if it does not <c=boldPurple>Exhaust</c>) and the end of the fight.

Impaired.name: Impaired
Impaired.description: The next time this card is played it acts as a <c=boldPink>non-upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play and the end of the fight.

EnhancedTools.name: ENHANCED TOOLS
EnhancedTools.description: The first time you play an <c=cardtrait>improved</c> card each fight, <c=action>improve</c> another card with the same upgrade.

ReusableMaterials.name: REUSABLE MATERIALS
ReusableMaterials.description: After playing a card with <c=cardtrait>improved</c>, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

Kickstart.name: KICKSTART
Kickstart.description: At the start of each fight <c=action>Improve A</c> the first 2 eligible cards you draw.

MagnifiedLasers.name: MAGNIFIED LASERS
MagnifiedLasers.description: If your rightmost card is an <c=keyword>upgraded</c> card it has +1 to all <c=keyword>attacks</c> on it.

UpgradedTerminal.name: UPGRADED TERMINAL
UpgradedTerminal.description: If you have 3 <c=keyword>upgraded</c> cards in hand when you draw a card, <c=keyword>draw</c> an extra card, once per turn.

Retainer.name: RETAINER
Retainer.description: Cards no longer lose <c=cardtrait>Improved</c> when played.

ExpensiveEquipment.name: EXPENSIVE EQUIPMENT
ExpensiveEquipment.description: Non-upgraded cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Upgraded cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>discount</c>.

PowerEcho.name: POWER ECHO
PowerEcho.description: The first time you play an upgraded card each turn, create an <c=cardtrait>Impaired</c>, <c=cardtrait>single use</c>, <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=keyword>copy</c> of it in your hand.

CleoBooks.name: SUMMONING STAFF
CleoBooks.description: The first time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

CleoCat.name: NEVERMIND
CleoCat.description: During combat, when choosing a card to add to your deck, you may choose <c=card>None of the Above</c> instead.

CleoDizzy.name: FORTIFY
CleoDizzy.description: <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c> also increases the amount of <c=status>SHIELD</c> cards give. Each combat, choose a card in your deck to <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c>.

CleoIsaac.name: CARE PACKAGE
CleoIsaac.description: On the first turn of each combat, add either a <c=card>Supply</c> or a <c=card>Demand</c> to your draw pile.

CleoMax.name: TREND CHASER
CleoMax.description: Every 3 turns, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all copies of the most abundant card in your deck. Ties result in no discount.

CleoRiggs.name: PLAN B
CleoRiggs.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if a card in your hand is upgraded to B.

description.None: Draw an <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> card from your Draw pile.
description.A: Draw an <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> card from your Draw pile.
description.B: Draw three <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> cards from your Draw pile.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Small Repairs</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Small Repairs A</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.B: Add 2 <c=card>Small Repairs</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.

description.None: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Discard pile</c>.
description.B: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Exhaust pile</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=keyword>A upgrade</c>.
description.A: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=keyword>A upgrade</c>.
description.B: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the 2 rightmost eligible cards in your hand to their <c=keyword>B upgrades</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.A: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.B: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.

description.None: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack.
description.A: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +2 dmg after each attack
description.B: Pierce attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cull</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cull</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cull</c> cards to your hand.

Thanatos.name: Thanatos
Thanatos.description: A large vessel with twin cannons. Built to hunt other ships.

Vulcan.name: Vulcan
Vulcan.description: A modified freighter with a thick hull. Built to withstand the toughest of punishments.

Athena.name: Athena
Athena.description: A war commander's old ship. Contains CPU data for thousands of war strategies.

Hermes.name: Hermes
Hermes.description: A decommissioned tourist vessel. It's erratic and loose controls brought it's downfall.

Neptune.name: Neptune
Neptune.description: A farmer's ship used for watering crops. Has 2 cold storage units that were repurposed into missile bays.

HunterCannons.name: HUNTER CANNONS
HunterCannons.description: If you did not hit the enemy on your turn and only 1 cannon is active, both of your cannons are active for the next turn. Afterwards, swap your active cannon.

ReaperCannons.name: REAPER CANNONS
ReaperCannons.description: If you you did not hit the enemy on your turn and only 1 cannon is active, both of your cannons are active for the next 3 turns. Afterwards, swap your active cannon. Replaces <c=artifact>HUNTER CANNONS</c>.

VulcanPlating.name: VULCAN PLATING
VulcanPlating.description: When a non-brittle, non-weak part of your ship is hit, it gains <c=part>ARMOR</c> for the rest of combat.

KineticRebound.name: KINETIC REBOUND
KineticRebound.description: When an <c=part>armored</c> part of your ship is hit, gain 2 <c=status>SHIELD.</c>

BattleTactics.name: BATTLE TACTICS
BattleTactics.description: The first time you play a <c=keyword>dual</c> card each turn, add a <c=card>PLAN B</c> to your hand with the cost, traits, and actions of the side you didn't use. It is also <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> and <c=cardtrait>exhaustable</c>. Your starter cards are dual cards (cards added by difficulty selection are unaffected).

EndlessPreparations.name: ENDLESS PREPARATIONS
EndlessPreparations.description: When you create a <c=card>PLAN B</c>, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> it.
